version_description:
-Fixed a Major Crash Bug
-Added support to China, Russia, Turkey, Saudi Arabia
-We'll be adding more UNICORN FOODS very soon!

Please email us at contact@shakeitmediainc.com if you have problems accessing this game. Thanks!

As requested, support for NO INTERNET!

You can now play your previously downloaded foods WITHOUT internet. Thanks users for the feedback.

-Fixed a bug that causes the game to freeze (please let us know if you still encounter this bug, thanks)
-Added 2 NEW FOODS: Infinity Stone Cupcake and Rainbow Snow Cone!

If you have any feedback or comments please drop us a line at:
https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/

2 NEW FOODS!
- Unicorn Popsicles
- Rainbow Bagels

I have read your reviews, we are working around the clock and SLIME will be released before end of this month, so keep coming back to check up our updates!

2 NEW FOODS this week!
-Slime Maker (finally, thanks to all the users that gave us reviews regarding this food!)
-Bubble Gum

This is ontop of the 2 Foods from last week in case you missed them:
-Unicorn Popsicles
-Rainbow Bagels

Please contact us if you have any problems or any cool ideas:
https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/

Unicorns Forever!! Enjoy!

NEW FOOD this week!

-Bubble Gum
*We are still working hard to get GLITTER SLIME Maker out asap.

This is ontop of the 2 Foods from last week in case you missed them:
-Unicorn Popsicles
-Rainbow Bagels

Please contact us if you have any problems or have any cool ideas:
https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/

Unicorns Forever!! Enjoy!

2 NEW Foods will be coming out this week!
-Unicorn Toast
-Unicorn Poop Cheesecake

Sorry for the delay, SLIME MAKER is still work in progress, we will have it out as soon as possible. Please keep coming back for updates.

Thanks to everyone for writing a review and contacting us via https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/. We read and reply every single review and email we receive from you.

If you like our game & unicorns, it would mean a lot to us if you give us 5 stars.

Enjoy!

Dear Users,
UPDATES November 05, 2019
- New Food is out! Galaxy Crepe!
- Unicorn Color Changing Noodles

Looking for more fun games? Check out our 3 NEW FUN and FREE games specifically for unicorn fans:

My Little Unicorn (super highly recommended)
https://apps.apple.com/app/my-little-unicorn-kimi/id1474312744

Unicorn Bakery
https://apps.apple.com/app/unicorn-chef-baking-games/id1472687696

Unicorn Edible Slime
https://apps.apple.com/app/unicorn-chef-edible-slime/id1460116212

If you like our app, it means a lot to us if you rate us 5 stars!

Feel free to drop us a review or contact us as contact@shakeitmediainc.com

As always, I read every review and email you send to us :)

Unicorn Forever! Shake It Team

Feel free to drop us a review or contact us as contact@shakeitmediainc.com

As always, I read every review and email you send to us :)

Unicorn Forever! Shake It Team

NEW Food out this week!
-Unicorn Milkshake

We also fixed a bug that causes a black screen or some of the foods not loading. If you still see this problem, please contact us at https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/

Thanks so much for your feedback, and Merry Christmas!!

Enjoy!

Happy New Year to all Unicorn Fans out there!

NEW Foods out:
-Galaxy Ice Cream Sandwich
-Gummy Candy Slime (edible)
-Unicorn Popcorn
-DIY Fluffy Slime (non-edible)
-Rose Ice Cream
-Hidden Galaxy Inside Cake

New Features:
-Added an option to remove ads via subscription. We make very very little from ads, so if you like what we are doing, support us by buying a subscription!
-New foods will no longer have the eating speedometer. And we also made the bite size bigger (thanks for all the reviews about this)
-The loading should be MUCH faster now, especially for users in Russia, India, Turkey, Australia, China. Please write a review if the app is still slow!

If you like our app, it means a lot to us if you rate us 5 stars.

As always, we read every review and email, so you have any comment or feedback at all, feel free to contact us and I will reply you as soon as possible!

We also have a few super fun apps that will be launched in march, upi can pre-order them now, they are 100% FREE:

Merimicorn Chef
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/unicorn-chef-mermaid-cooking/id1441599238?mt=8

Unicorn Slime (many of you asked for this!!)
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/unicorn-slime-cooking-games/id1448228271?mt=8

Thanks to all of you for writing reviews and showing your appreciation. It means a lot to us!

Regards,
Unicorn Forever!! Shake It Team
